snippet: At Carroll Academy, a school for troubled teenagers in Huntingdon, Tenn., basketball is a means to provide the players with supervision and structure and to teach them about teamwork and trust.
abstract: Carroll Academy, a school for troubled teenagers in Huntingdon, Tenn, uses basketball as a means to provide the players, mostly novices and all troubled young women, supervision and structure and to teach them about teamwork and trust; Destiny, a 17-year-old senior with a crossover dribble, a silky shooting touch and a habit of drug use, was the only one of the nine Carroll Academy players with any previous high school basketball experience. (Series: The Lady Jaguars)
lead_paragraph: At Carroll Academy, a school for troubled teenagers in Huntingdon, Tenn., basketball is a means to provide the players with supervision and structure and to teach them about teamwork and trust.

headline.seo: At a School in Tennessee, a Basketball Team of Survivors
